SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &FLAG# = 0 : IF "" EQ &UC4RB_SSH_USERNAME# OR &UC4RB_SSH_HOST# : SET &FLAG# = 1 : ENDIF : IF &FLAG# = 1 : STOP MSG, 50, "SSH connection details are required when [Connection Tool] is set to 'SSH'." : ENDIF ! SSH:Check for password and private key : SET &COUNT# = 0
: IF &UC4RB_SSH_KEY# NE "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_SSH_PASSWORD# NE "" OR "--10" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 : ENDIF
: IF &COUNT# EQ 0 OR 2 : STOP MSG, 50, "SSH: Please provide either private key or password" : ENDIF
